Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27664 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.18.8-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-27664 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.18.8-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.18.8-1, affected by CVE-2022-27664
